message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $10,000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $9,500?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I believe this product is worth more, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $9,750? This would be a fair price for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I am still looking to keep my spending lower. Could we possibly agree on $9,500 for the product?
